name: Something Needs Storage permission or another
spec: some blocks Need Storage permission or another

name: Play music online
spec: try to play music with id %m.mediaplayer  from link %s.inputOnly if got error then

name: assets save
spec: save file from assets that has name  %s into path %s with name %s

name: send email
spec: send message from user to your gmali %s  with message %s
code: Intent intent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_SENDTO); intent.setData(Uri.parse("mailto:")); intent.putExtra(Intent.EXTRA_EMAIL , new String[] { %s }); intent.putExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SUBJECT, %s); startActivity(Intent.createChooser(intent, "Email via..."));

name: packagename
spec: get package name of this app

name: Flashlight On
Flashlight Off
uninstall app
code: Uri packageURI = Uri.parse("package:".concat(%s)); Intent uninstallIntent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_DELETE, packageURI); startActivity(uninstallIntent);

name: open class in app
spec: open class with name %s.inputOnly in app with package name %s.inputOnly

name: record video
spec: use %m.camera to record video with id %s.inputOnly
